name: Forest Of Sacrifices
description:
~~~

I have entered the Forest of Sacrifices to extinguish the rage of the gods against my people,
But here is not like what I remember...
It is infested with bugs and thorns,
The goats are acting ungoatly,

Still I must continue...

~~~
Explore and overcome the forest in this short, atmospheric metroidvania platformer.

Made for Ludum Dare 43 in less than 72 hours.

The post jam version has some changes including mechanical tweaks.  Most importantly wall jumping is easier now. Gamepad support is also added.

Controls:  Arrow keys, Z, X, C.  Esc to quit.
